title: You're Number One, Now Believe It!: How to love, care and respect yourself in the midst of a setback
description: You're Number One, Now Believe It! is a story about setbacks and how to ovecome them by learning to love yourself and put you first without feelings of guilt when dealing with life's challenges.While going through a divorce a few years ago, the author realized how broken it made her feel and knew that she had to do something about it. With the support of those closest to her and the creation of her 4Self System, she was able to refocus her life and set positive intentions for her mind, body and soul.The book shares the story of her marriage and divorce and how 4Self-self-love, self-respect, self-esteem, and self-care helped her to overcome and move forward stronger than ever.
author: Naudia Lorraine
